results.title: EZH2 presents a therapeutic target for neuroendocrine tumors of the small intestine
results.text_hl: Therefore, in addition to the inhibitory effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @GENE_MTOR @GENE_2475 @@@mTOR@@@ signaling pathway in NETs, our results suggested that downregulation of @GENE_EZH2 @GENE_2146 @@@EZH2@@@ can also partially contribute to the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-antitumor effect in @<m>DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@SI-NETs@@@.

results.title: Limitations and suggestions for type 2 diabetes mellitus and pancreatic neuroendocrine tumors based on meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: However, due to the limited number of studies and high heterogeneity, the role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the diagnosis and prognosis of @<m>DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@pNETs@@@ remained inconclusive.

results.title: Lifestyle Factors and Development and Natural Course of Gastroenteropancreatic Neuroendocrine Tumors: A Review of the Literature.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@Diabetes@@@ was reported as a risk factor for @<m>DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@NETs@@@, while a protective effect was observed with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use.

results.title: Metformin use and young age lung cancer: A case series report.
results.text_hl: It was suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment was not effective in the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@pulmonary NETs@@@, and that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may instead induce the occurrence of @<m>DISEASE_Neuroendocrine_Tumors</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D018358 @@@NETs@@@ via as yet unknown signaling pathways.
